title: Inside Stacey Dooley's plush home with stylish touch which boasts lots of flowers and candles
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Stacey Dooley's chic London pad fits perfectly with her laid back personality and quirky style.

It seems the TV presenter's love of fashion resembles throughout her very modern home aswell.

Having moved out of the home she shared with ex boyfriend Sam Tucknott, the 32-year-old has managed to find her feet and settle into a cosy new place all by herself.

She is now dating her professional dance partner Kevin Clifton, but it's not known if the pair live together.

Stacey's living room boats a stylish little two-seater black sofa with plush quilted detailing, and she has added a mini black coffee table to match, complete with an issue of Vogue magazine placed in the middle for detail, or reading.

(Image: Instagram)

The Strictly star is a sucker for candles, as she has placed a few jars around the house.

Dooley is a minimalist, as her approach to interior is basic, but with a modern twist - the walls are painted in cream tones while the floors are covered with chocolate brown carpet.

(Image: Instagram)

Moving onto the red-haired beauty's suave kitchen, she has a circular marble table decorated with a large purple vase and matching flowers.

Her white work top features a large lamp, and another oversized house plant. The kitchen is equipped with modern utilities.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Stacey dons a classy outfit in a bathroom mirror selfie, showcasing her full-length wall to floor mirrors.

Her rather open and large bathroom matches the rest of the neutral colour scheme around her home, as it boasts a grey and beige theme.

She poses in a pair of pointed flats, paper bag trousers and a classic black blouse.

The star had left a cup of tea in the picture to show she's exactly the same as the next person.

(Image: Instagram)

Stacey's pooch Bernie is pictured lying on her bed and looks extra cosy on the rose toned duvet. It seems the star has injected a bit of colour into her bedroom.

Another Instagram picture shows a vase full of blooming flowers with fashion magazines laid beside it.

Her love for flowers and fashion is clearly displayed around the home.

(Image: Instagram)

One of her rooms gives off a cosy vibe. It's decorated with a small furry white rug which is unevenly shaped, and a circle mirror leans against the wall on the floor.

She swapped a house plant for a vase of pampas grass in a funky vase, and a piece of fine art can be seen framed and leaving on her floor through the mirror's reflection.

(Image: Instagram)

Like many of us, Stacey relaxes at home with a candle and a good binge on TV shows.

Another circle mirror appears in the corner, and a table matching the one in her kitchen.

She has a large flat screen TV placed neatly on the wall and again, more vases of flowers dotted around.

Her lavish £1,000 MacBook can be seen lying on the table top, which suggests she's into her technology.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Sticking with the cosy vibe, fluffy blankets and throws can be seen on the sofa, perfect for a snuggle.

The Strictly star can be seen standing in a vintage looking hallway with an oak dining table and chairs and a huge staircase.

The stone wall gives off a stylish country home touch, with floor-length cream curtains to complete the look.
description: The TV presenter boasts an inviting, cosy home with chic interior and a flower and candle obsession
